Uses of Package
nl.esciencecenter.neon.math

  • Packages that use nl.esciencecenter.neon.math 
    Package Description
    nl.esciencecenter.neon
    This package contains the most important classes for the Neon Library and is the root package for all the other Neon packages except for the example implementation.
    nl.esciencecenter.neon.input
    The user-input centered classes of the library.
    nl.esciencecenter.neon.math
    The matrix/vector math library needed for OpenGL 3.0+ functionality.
    nl.esciencecenter.neon.models
    Simple geometric models for use by the library.
    nl.esciencecenter.neon.models.graphs
    Several ready-to-apply generic graph models.
    nl.esciencecenter.neon.shaders
    GLSL Shader wrapper packages for Object-Oriented shader-enabled programming.
    nl.esciencecenter.neon.text
    Package containing the classes needed to implement 3d and 2d text in jogl.
    nl.esciencecenter.neon.util
    Utility classes for the Neon library, like a Settings file reader implementation.
  • Classes in nl.esciencecenter.neon.math used by nl.esciencecenter.neon 
    Class and Description
    Float4Matrix
    4x4 float matrix implementation
  • Classes in nl.esciencecenter.neon.math used by nl.esciencecenter.neon.input 
    Class and Description
    Float3Vector
    A 3-place float vector implementation
  • Classes in nl.esciencecenter.neon.math used by nl.esciencecenter.neon.math 
    Class and Description
    Color4
    More specific implementation of a color Float4Vector.
    Float2Matrix
    2x2 float matrix implementation.
    Float2Vector
    A 2-place float vector implementation.
    Float3Matrix
    3x3 float matrix implementation
    Float3Vector
    A 3-place float vector implementation
    Float4Matrix
    4x4 float matrix implementation
    Float4Vector
    A 4-place float vector implementation.
    FloatMatrix
    Abstract class for all Matrices that provides several utility functions.
    FloatVector
    Generic interface for all float vector implementations.
  • Classes in nl.esciencecenter.neon.math used by nl.esciencecenter.neon.models 
    Class and Description
    Color4
    More specific implementation of a color Float4Vector.
    Float3Vector
    A 3-place float vector implementation
  • Classes in nl.esciencecenter.neon.math used by nl.esciencecenter.neon.models.graphs 
    Class and Description
    Color4
    More specific implementation of a color Float4Vector.
    Float4Matrix
    4x4 float matrix implementation
    Float4Vector
    A 4-place float vector implementation.
    Point4
    A optional, more specific Float4Vector implementation for points.
  • Classes in nl.esciencecenter.neon.math used by nl.esciencecenter.neon.shaders 
    Class and Description
    FloatMatrix
    Abstract class for all Matrices that provides several utility functions.
    FloatVector
    Generic interface for all float vector implementations.
  • Classes in nl.esciencecenter.neon.math used by nl.esciencecenter.neon.text

    More specific implementation of a color Float4Vector.
  • Classes in nl.esciencecenter.neon.math used by nl.esciencecenter.neon.util
